name: icicle/icicle
description: Icicle is a PHP library for writing asynchronous code using synchronous coding techniques.

suggest.ext-openssl: Enables using SSL/TLS on stream sockets.
suggest.ext-pcntl: Enables custom signal handling, process forking, and child process execution.
suggest.ext-event: Preferred extension for providing an event loop with better performance.
suggest.ext-libevent: Alternative extension that also provides an event loop with better performance.
